directions: Combine cheese, Port, butter, mustard and pepper in processor. Blend until mixture is smooth, scraping down sides of bowl occasionally. Add onions; using on/off turns, process until just blended. Transfer spread to small bowl or crock. (Can be prepared 3 days ahead. Cover and refrigerate. Bring spread to room temperature before serving.)
Place bowl of spread on platter. Surround with crackers and serve.
ingredients: 10 ounces sharp cheddar cheese, diced, room temperature
1/4 cup (1/2 stick) unsalted butter, room temperature
title: Potted Cheese Spread with Crackers
